action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square with 'X' marks forming a border around the grid and a cross shape in the center. The 'X' marks are in the first and last rows and columns, as well as the entire middle row. The remaining cells are empty, represented by '▢'.

The third row has 'X' at the first, third, fourth, and fifth positions, with '▢' in the second position. The fourth row is identical to the first row. The fifth row is identical to the fourth row.
